results.title: Britzy Thrifty Vintage Goods
results.announcement:
Britzy Thrifty began with a love of thrifting & vintage finds that resulted in a closet bursting at the seams, & ended up as a Michigan based Etsy shop.

Visit frequently for the latest finds in unique vintage fashions. Shopping for vintage clothing is a great way to live a greener lifestyle. 

While you're at it... come check out @BritzyThrifty on Instagram, Pinterest & Twitter for photos of our latest #thriftscores & thrifting tips.
results.sale_message: All items for sale are in excellent vintage condition, unless otherwise noted in listing. Pre-owned goods may show minor signs of wear due to age. I personally inspect every garment, but sometimes small flaws or blemishes get missed. If you are concerned about a particular item's condition, please contact me. All concerns will be addressed promptly, and returns are accepted only on a case by case basis.
results.policy_welcome: Welcome one & all! Feast your eyes on the luscious display of beautiful vintage textiles, fabric, and embellishments galore! Feel free to kick back and let the fashions of the past become your new favorite styles...
results.policy_payment: We gladly accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal and Etsy gift cards.
results.policy_shipping: Purchases will be shipped within 1-3 business days. Buyers please note that the cost of shipping is not reflected in the price of any listed item. Shipping prices will also differ with each piece because of weight and shipping method.  Everything is shipped through USPS with the option of priority mail, first class, or parcel post. Shipping insurance available upon buyer request.
results.policy_refunds: Returns are taken on a case by case basis only. Buyers please note that the vintage items for sale have been around for years and may have some imperfections due to age. Listings will describe any found imperfections, but some may slip through the cracks. If you wish to exchange or return an item, please contact sarahbethbritz@ gmail.com within 3 days of receiving your purchase. Terms of return/exchange will then be discussed. Buyer must fund return shipment, and use delivery confirmation.
results.policy_additional: Goods for sale are unaltered unless otherwise stated in item specific listing. Any info on the age of a listed item is approximate.
results.policy_seller_info: Check out @BritzyThrifty on instagram, twitter, pinterest & facebook for photos of #thriftscores & thrifting tips.
